page.title: 19Neville Attfield 7.12.1899.
page.content: Our school did a survey in Thornton during June 1985.Our findings were interesting.We interviewed 72 households out of a total of 773 in the village approx. 10% of the total. We asked what facilities would you like to see in Thornton. Gas 1, chemist/Doctor 25 ,guides 1, free church 1, sports facilities 15, shops 9,buses 20, fish and chips 5. people are most concerned about the lack of health facilities and the poor bus services. We asked people what they disliked about Thornton. Noisy fast traffic 4 .Street parking 1 . broken glass 1 .dog litter 6 Thornton too isolated 2 . poor amenities 1 .As only 15 people answered we feel most people must be happy.We asked how often people use the shops a week every day 20,3 days 10,4 days 9,1 day 11,6 days never 3
